document_data.name: Elthenhelm Hamastyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Elthenhelm Hastyl''' was a [[truenamer]]. He led the [[House of the Unnamed]] academy in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: He was a [[truenamer]] of no small power.
document_data.Activities: He led the [[House of the Unnamed]] academy in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He was the brother of [[Nerrol Hamastyl]].
